allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add project scaffolding, spec-audited task plan, and foundation implementations

Complete project bootstrap: config system, precision API, metrics module,
quantization/agent/dataset/evaluation stubs, Docker setup, and CLI scaffolds.
Tasks.md v2 expands to 93 atomic tasks after thorough spec S8.1/S9.3/S8.3
audit fixing control condition definitions, adding inner monologue forensics,
statistical test decomposition, and dataset validation pipeline.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Align all project docs with spec v4 \(from v3.2\)

Updates tasks.md, CLAUDE.md, PRD.md, codex.md, status.md, checkpoint.md
to reference digital_necrosis_spec_v4.docx. Adds new v4 content to PRD:
empirical precedent \(Section 2.4\), necrotic mechanism mapping \(Section 3.2\),
compounding necrosis cycles, engineering implications, and NeurIPS checklist.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
